    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <identifier>

            <entry>merli/3248</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La bruixa</string>
            <string language="en">The witch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Hexe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La sorcière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A bruxa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La strega</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μάγισσα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Joc d'iniciació en l'ús del ratolí. Es tracta de desplaçar la bruixa amunt i avall amb el ratolí per tal d'esquivar els estels.</string>
            <string language="en">Introductory game on the use of the mouse. The player must move the witch one way and another with the mouse to avoid the stars.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">atenció</string>
            <string language="en">attention</string>
            <string language="es">atención</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">orientació</string>
            <string language="en">gear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">percepció</string>
            <string language="en">perception</string>
            <string language="es">percepción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">habilitat</string>
            <string language="en">skill</string>
            <string language="es">habilidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitendes Spiel auf dem Gebrauch der Maus. 
Der Spieler muß die Einweg Hexe und andere mit der Maus 
verschieben, um die Sterne zu vermeiden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu préliminaire sur l'utilisation de la souris. 
Le joueur doit déplacer la sorcière à sens unique et un autre
avec la souris pour éviter tient le premier rôle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo introdutório no uso do rato. O jogador
deve mover a bruxa de sentido único e outra com o rato para evitar as
estrelas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioco introduttivo sull'uso del mouse. Il 
giocatore deve spostare la strega unidirezionale ed un altro con il 
mouse per evitare le stelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγικό παιχνίδι στη χρήση του ποντικιού. Ο 
φορέας πρέπει να κινήσει τη μάγισσα ένα τρόπος και άλλο με το 
ποντίκι για να αποφύγει τα αστέρια.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufmerksamkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahnrad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorstellung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fähigkeit</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
